changeSet.author: vitalii.kim
changeSet.sql:
create table if not exists mart_order_pnl ( id bigserial primary key,
account_id bigint not null, source_platform text not null, order_id text not null,
currency text not null,
first_finance_date date not null, last_finance_date date not null,
revenue_gross numeric(18, 2) not null, seller_discount_amount numeric(18, 2) not null, marketplace_commission_amount numeric(18, 2) not null, acquiring_commission_amount numeric(18, 2) not null, logistics_cost_amount numeric(18, 2) not null, penalties_amount numeric(18, 2) not null, marketing_cost_amount numeric(18, 2) not null, compensation_amount numeric(18, 2) not null, refund_amount numeric(18, 2) not null,
net_payout numeric(18, 2) not null, pnl_amount numeric(18, 2) not null default 0,
items_sold_count integer not null default 0, returned_items_count integer not null default 0, is_returned boolean not null default false, has_penalties boolean not null default false,
created_at timestamptz not null default now(), updated_at timestamptz not null default now(),
constraint uq_mart_order_pnl_business_key unique (account_id, source_platform, order_id) );
